name: Rac
content:
Rac was a young, female Human Jedi Knight.
Seeking revenge for the deaths of a number of Jedi on Kamino, a water-covered planet beyond the galaxy's Outer Rim, Rac tracked the bounty hunter Jango Fett to Mos Espa on the desert world Tatooine. There, she confronted him in a vendor alley, drawing her lightsaber. Familiar with Rac, Fett remarked that he should have killed her along with the other Jedi on Kamino. Fett survived the encounter, eventually falling to Jedi Master Mace Windu in battle on Geonosis.
Rac had dark hair and fair skin, wore Jedi robes, and carried a lightsaber.
Rac first appeared in the 2007 book You Can Draw: Star Wars, drawn by Matt Busch and written by Bonnie Burton. She featured in Jango Fett: Scum and Villainy #X, a sample script used to illustrate the comic-making process.
